If you go into this game with story/character expectations\, then you will be disappointed. This IS NOT The Last of Us 1.5\, this is an entirely new\, more realistic\, more human\, game. Go into this game with an open mind\, and it will stay with you for a LONG time afterwards. Characters you hate at the start (one in particular) are so well developed that you understand\, if not like them\, by the end. The same happens for the hero characters\, you will disagree with their actions throughout the game\, and your opinion on them will be changed\, because they are painted as real humans\, making real human decisions\, some good and some bad. The game is made up of morally grey characters\, unlike most games made up of black and white characters.All the above isn't just good or bad writing\, but excellent writing. The story is fantastic\, gut wrenching\, spellbinding\, and most importantly real - or as much real as it can be in a post-apoc setting.People are calling this game of the year\, I'm calling it game of the generation.… Expand
